data.text: Service Record: Enlisted in Company D, North Carolina 7th Cavalry Battalion on 15 Jul 1862.Mustered out on 03 Aug 1863.Transferred to Company C, North Carolina 6th Cavalry Regiment on 03 Aug 1863 Service Record: Enlisted in Company H, North Carolina 25th Infantry Regiment on 15 Jul 1861.Mustered out on 07 Jul 1862 Service Record: Enlisted in Company H, North Carolina 25th Infantry Regiment on 15 Jul 1861.Mustered out on 09 Apr 1865 at Appomattox Court House, VA Service Record: Enlisted in Company H, North Carolina 25th Infantry Regiment on 15 Jul 1861.Mustered out on 09 Apr 1865 at Appomattox Court House, VA Service Record: Enlisted in Company D, North Carolina 7th Cavalry Battalion on 15 Jul 1862.Mustered out on 03 Aug 1863.Transferred to on 03 Aug 1863 Service Record: Enlisted in Company I, North Carolina 16th Infantry Regiment on 05 May 1861.Mustered out on 07 Sep 1864.Transferred to on 07 Sep 1864 Service Record: Commissioned an officer in Company D, North Carolina 60th Infantry Regiment on 10 Jul 1862.Mustered out on 05 Nov 1862. Service Record: Enlisted in Company G, North Carolina 35th Infantry Regiment on 05 Nov 1861.Promoted to Full Sergeant on 15 Mar 1862.Mustered out on 23 Dec 1862 at Richmond, VA Service Record: Enlisted in Company D, North Carolina 7th Cavalry Battalion on 15 Jul 1862.Mustered out on 03 Aug 1863.Transferred to on 03 Aug 1863 Service Record: Ã‚ Enlisted in Company E, North Carolina 25th Infantry Regiment on 15 Jun 1861.Promoted to Full 3rd Lieutenant on 11 Aug 1862.Mustered out on 10 Oct 1863.Promoted to Full 2nd Lieutenant on 12 May 1863 Service Record: Enlisted in Company A, North Carolina 25th Infantry Regiment on 15 May 1861.Mustered out on 02 Sep 1862 Service Record: Enlisted in Company A, North Carolina 25th Infantry Regiment on 15 May 1861
